auditorium

Class Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.Signature

  • public class Signature
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the auditorium signature data structure. Its format is (signature [signer-id] [sigdata] {payload}).

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private ASExpression _payload

    • Constructor Detail

      • Signature

        public Signature(java.lang.String id,
         StringExpression sigdata,
         ASExpression payload)
        Parameters:
        id - This is the ID of the signer.
        sigdata - This is the actual digital signature bytes.
        payload - This is the thing that is signed.

      • Signature

        public Signature(ASExpression expression)
          throws IncorrectFormatException
        Construct a signature structure based on its s-expression format.
        Parameters:
        expression - This is the expression that will be converted.
        Throws:
        IncorrectFormatException - This method throws if the given expression is not formatted as (signature [signer-id] [sigdata] {payload}).

    • Method Detail

      • toASE

        public ASExpression toASE()
        Returns:
        This method returns this signature in its s-expression form.

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        This method returns the ID of the signer.

      • getSigData

        public StringExpression getSigData()
        Returns:
        This method returns the signature data.

      • getPayload

        public ASExpression getPayload()
        Returns:
        This method returns the payload -- the expression that was signed.
